pageContext.claim: “So we made it so dishwashers now have a lot more water. And in many places -- in most places of the country, water is not a problem. They don't know what to do with it. It's called 'rain.' They don't have a problem.”
pageContext.analysis: Think hard about this claim. Have you ever met anyone who had to run the dishwasher this many times because of low water pressure?
